Package com.heno.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.heno.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
This service class handles user authentication and registration operations.

    • loginUser

      public String loginUser(SignInDto signInDto)
      Authenticates a user based on the provided credentials and generates a JSON Web Token (JWT) for successful authentication.
      Parameters:
      signInDto - The sign-in data containing the username and password for authentication.
      Returns:
      A JWT token representing the authenticated user.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.authentication.BadCredentialsException - If the provided credentials are invalid.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(SignUpDto signUpDto)
      Registers a new user with the provided sign-up data.
      Parameters:
      signUpDto - The sign-up data containing the user info for registration.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If a user with the specified username already exists.
